tool.summary: This tool computes the acute angle raster between the topographic surface defined by slope and aspect rasters internally derived from input elevation raster, and a structural plane defined by diop direction- and dip grids. Optionally, the dip direction and dip of the cutting line linears between the two planes can be calculated Reference: Günther, A. (2003). SLOPEMAP: programs for automated mapping of geometrical and kinematical properties of hard rock hill slopes. Computers & Geosciences, 29, 865 - 875.
